name: Pinterest - Gray Theme
description: A dark gray theme for Pinterest
obsoletion_message:
It appears to be impossible to keep this updated because Pinterest randomly changes its HTML code quite frequently...random class names and attributes.  I can't deal with that, so I'm sorry I have to delete it.

Other reasons...
* I don't visit Pinterest very often anymore.
* userstyles.org itself is getting really crappy.
* Stylish addon is now owned by an advertisement company.

Note: I've changed the license to public domain now, so if someone wants to copy the style and make it their own, you're free to do that.
additional_info:
If something is broken, hard to read, or just bothers you, feel free to use the Send Feedback button below and let me know. REQUIREMENTS
  • At least Chrome 49, or Firefox 31, or basically any browser that supports CSS variables.
  • Must be logged into your Pinterest account
MY USERSCRIPTS
  • - Pinterest - Open Original Image
  • - Pinterest - Remove Unwanted Pins
Requires a userscript add-on like Tampermonkey, Violentmonkey, or Greasemonkey.
